description: Devoxx Poland Organiser takes a break from the madness of running an event for 2,500 developers and tells us what's new in 2016 and what to look out for in the future.
short_description: Devoxx Poland Organiser takes a break from the madness of running an event for 2,500 developers and tells us what's new in 2016
title: What's New and Happening at Devoxx Poland?
